summary:
Energy professional with seventeen years’ experience in technical and subsurface coordination roles covering Middle East, North Sea, Caspian Sea, Niger delta, Offshore Gabon and Brazil deep water. 

I have established credibility in leveraging technology for delivering value to the business. Roles within the last four years in Iraq, Brazil and Netherlands have exposed me to full project lifecycle from exploration through development and WRFM ; and recently energy transition
 
My core skills include Operational Petrophysics, Integrated Petrophysical field studies, Reservoir monitoring and surveillance, QI Petrophysics, Pore pressure prediction, Core/Logging contract management and CCUS.
